conjurer:AeonianButterfly.FLAVOR: According to myth, these butterflies were once the wings of the Goddess of Rot herself.
conjurer:AeonianButterfly.NAME: Aeonian Butterfly

conjurer:BeastEye.FLAVOR: The murky violet iris writhes as if alive.
conjurer:BeastEye.NAME: Beast Eye

conjurer:Bloodrose.FLAVOR: Blood-slick roses that bloom in festering blood.
conjurer:Bloodrose.NAME: Bloodrose

conjurer:CelestialDew.FLAVOR: Once upon a time, the stars of the night sky guided fate, and this is a recollection of those times.
conjurer:CelestialDew.NAME: Celestial Dew

conjurer:CrimsonMapleLeaf.FLAVOR: On this mountain path, where the red leaves lifeless lie... My heart calls for a companion, echoing the deer's cry...
conjurer:CrimsonMapleLeaf.NAME: Crimson Maple Leaf

conjurer:CrimsonwhorlBubbletear.FLAVOR: A crystal tear formed slowly over the ages where the Erdtree's bounty falls to the ground.
conjurer:CrimsonwhorlBubbletear.NAME: Crimsonwhorl Bubbletear

conjurer:DarkMoonRing.FLAVOR: Whoever thou mayest be, take not the ring from this place, the solitude beyond the night is better mine alone.
conjurer:DarkMoonRing.NAME: Dark Moon Ring

DESCRIPTIONS: {#o:Right-Click in battle}: Target a creature and take its form. | At combat start, trigger an effect dependent on your current form.
conjurer:DisguisePropBox.FLAVOR: You can be whoever you want to be.
conjurer:DisguisePropBox.NAME: Disguise Prop Box

conjurer:HeavyGem.FLAVOR: A warrior can appreciate a heavy weapon.
conjurer:HeavyGem.NAME: Heavy Gem

DESCRIPTIONS: The first card played each combat applies its corresponding #yElements to enemy targets. If it didn't target enemies, a random enemy is targeted instead.
conjurer:PeriodicTable.FLAVOR: A table that repeats itself every so often.
conjurer:PeriodicTable.NAME: Periodic Table

conjurer:QuadraticGlobe.FLAVOR: The globe can spin any way you want it to.
conjurer:QuadraticGlobe.NAME: Quadratic Globe

DESCRIPTIONS: [Poison] is treated as [conjurer:Ventus]. At the end of round, [Poison] triggers an additional time and is cut in half.
conjurer:ScorpionStinger.NAME: Scorpion Stinger

conjurer:StochasticTable.FLAVOR: A table that is very, very unpredictable.
conjurer:StochasticTable.NAME: Stochastic Table

conjurer:SunlightMedal.FLAVOR: Reminds one of the great honor of a shared victory.
conjurer:SunlightMedal.NAME: Sunlight Medal

DESCRIPTIONS: Disables [A-O]. [A-R] now #yReacts with [A-G]. If you would apply [conjurer:Petra], gain it as [Next Turn Block] instead.
conjurer:Triquetra.FLAVOR: Divide by three and you get...
conjurer:Triquetra.NAME: Triquetra

DESCRIPTIONS: #yMist cards become more potent. | Upon pickup, obtain a random #yMist card.
conjurer:UpliftingAromatic.FLAVOR: Inside the amber, a small, long-extinct insect remains frozen in time.
conjurer:UpliftingAromatic.NAME: Uplifting Aromatic
